title: Add --awaiting filter to tk list
description:
Add --awaiting filter flag to the list command

Usage: 
  tk list --awaiting              # All ticks awaiting human
  tk list --awaiting approval     # Specific awaiting type
  tk list --awaiting approval,review  # Multiple types

Behavior:
- No value: filter to any awaiting != null
- With value: filter to specific awaiting type(s)
- Comma-separated for multiple types
- Combines with other filters (--status, --owner, etc.)

Implementation:
- Add --awaiting flag to list FlagSet
- Parse as optional string (no value vs specific value)
- Add filter logic in query.Apply or as post-filter
- Consider backwards compat with Manual field

Use cases:
  tk list --awaiting             # What needs my attention?
  tk list --awaiting approval    # What needs sign-off?
  tk list --awaiting input       # What questions need answering?
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] --awaiting flag added to list command
- [ ] No value filters to any awaiting != null
- [ ] Specific value filters to that awaiting type
- [ ] Comma-separated values work
- [ ] Combines correctly with other filters
- [ ] Also matches Manual=true ticks (backwards compat)
closed_reason: Verified implementation of --awaiting filter on list command was already complete: optionalString flag type with empty-value (all awaiting) and specific value (comma-separated types) support. Added comprehensive tests for all filter behaviors: empty value filters all awaiting ticks, specific type filtering, comma-separated multiple types, backwards compat with Manual=true ticks (maps to awaiting=work), and combination with other filters.
